data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miranda, Gil Felipe Gonçalves (2017): Revision of the Hybobathus arx and Pelecinobaccha summa species groups (Diptera: Syrphidae). Zootaxa 4338 (1): 1-43, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.1.1|62 occurrences
